name: test Get Multiple Clients Preferred Providers BadRequest
fullName: /SchedulingOptimizationRegression//Historical Data in Clinic Algorithm//C951299 Preferred client gets scheduled with their most preferred provider#test Get Multiple Clients Preferred Providers BadRequest
descriptionHtml:
## [https://centralreach.atlassian.net/browse/CRCH-18299](https://centralreach.atlassian.net/browse/CRCH-18299)
Request Description

This endpoint retrieves the preferred providers for the specified client IDs.

### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

### Request Parameters

- `clientIds` (query parameter) - A comma-separated list of client IDs for which preferred providers are to be retrieved.


## Response

The response will be in JSON format and will have the following schema:

``` json
{
"type": "object",
"properties": {
"results": {
"type": "array",
"items": {
"type": "object",
"properties": {
"clientId": {
"type": "integer"
},
"providerIds": {
"type": "array",
"items": {
"type": "integer"
}
},
"isManualSettings": {
"type": "boolean"
},
"lastModifiedDateTime": {
"type": "string"
}
}
}
},
"result": {
"type": "string"
},
"failed": {
"type": "boolean"
},
"cachedTime": {
"type": "integer"
}
}
}

```
